title: Armchair, ca. 1930
medium: wood, metallic springs, gold colored velvet upholstery
description: Upholstered armchair with shaped back, finished in a straight line leading down over two symmetrical curvatures in the back's frame.  Similar curvatures lead from each armrest to the chair's seat.  Gold colored velvet upholstery.  Simply cut wooden legs, tapering, and with a carved indentation to indicate chair's feet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Armchair, ca. 1930.
ca. 1930. wood, metallic springs, gold colored velvet upholstery. Gift of Juliett Castle. 1977-105-1.
